name: Oakworks Spa Wellness
descr:
Electric lift, electric tile and Access Desigh Top offer immense versatility, spa-worthy comfort and superior ergonomic accuracy. With manual top adjustments its and undreamed-of value and a pretty unbeatable combination.

Length: 180 cm. Width: 73 or 78 cm. Height Range: 61 - 88 cm.

Operates with dual motor, 2 foot controls and 1 hand control.
